markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Cinder Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=187)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These oversized rodents are made of smoldering charcoal and elemental fire, and noxious fumes continually bellow from their flaming flesh.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Cinder Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=187)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 148</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision, smoke vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The cinder rat ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Weaknesses**
cold 5

**Fetid Fumes** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) 5 feet. A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn there must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become sickened 1. Everything within the aura, including the cinder rat, is concealed by smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 fire plus 1d4 persistent fire

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-43" />
name: Cinder Rat
